name: Intro to RL
subtitle: Patrick / Andrew
description: Are you interested in learning how a computer can learn how to play a game all on its own? Through the power of Reinforcement Learning, in this workshop we will be explaining we can use neural networks (and some statistics) to make a machine learning model gradually learn how to "beat" a game. The only requirement is that you have a working Python installation above version 3.0 and want to learn!
